ExerciseInstructions: Targets the upper chest and shoulders. Performed lying on an incline bench, pressing dumbbells upward from chest level until arms are extended.
Works the lats, upper back, and biceps. Pull a wide bar down to the upper chest while keeping the torso upright.
Strengthens the triceps. Performed by extending a dumbbell or cable overhead from behind the head to a full arm lockout.
Isolates the biceps by resting the elbows on a pad or knee and curling a dumbbell upward through a full range of motion.
Targets the side delts. Raise dumbbells out to the sides until arms are parallel with the floor, keeping a slight bend in the elbows.
Works the hamstrings. Sitting on a leg curl machine, pull the padded lever down toward the back of your legs.
Focuses on the quadriceps. Sitting upright, extend your legs upward against resistance until fully straight.
Targets the brachioradialis and biceps. Using an overhand grip, curl the cable bar upward while keeping elbows close to the body.
Builds quads, glutes, and hamstrings. Push a weighted platform away using your legs, keeping feet shoulder-width apart.
Strengthens the lower back and glutes. Bend forward at the hips on a back extension bench, then raise your torso until aligned with your legs.
Engages the upper abs. On a decline bench, curl your torso upward toward your knees while keeping the lower body stable.
